typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PO as string,
		Vendor as string,
		Apple as string,
		Mango as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 unpivot(output(
		Fruits as string,
		Amout as string
	),
	ungroupBy({} = PO,
		{} = Vendor),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
